content:
Q: What does Alternative Maid Services cover?
A: Alternative maid services pay for the cost of hiring temporary help if your helper is hospitalised due to injury or illness. The payout per day ranges from $100 to $200 for Enhanced, Premier and Exclusive Plans. We have also arranged a special rate with our partner to assist you if your helper is unable to perform their duties, you will receive an email from us notifying you of the promotion code. Simply use the promotion code at checkout to enjoy the special rate.
questions: What types of plans does Alternative Maid Services offer?
How much can I expect to receive per day for hiring temporary help?
What happens if my helper is hospitalized?
Is there a special rate available for hiring temporary help?
How do I access the special rate for temporary help?
What should I do if my helper is unable to perform their duties?
Will I be notified about the promotion code for the special rate?
What is the range of payout per day for the Enhanced, Premier, and Exclusive Plans?
Can I use the promotion code at any time?
What is the process for claiming the payout if my helper is hospitalized?
